TEXT: The Imposter: an evil monster posing as a crewmate to infiltrate the Spire.  Makes use of vents, votes, and sus to manipulate its way to the Heart.
NL You nearly murder the heart

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~Crewmate,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
